display.title: Acquire: minecraft:sand
description: Yet another &&bForge Hammer&&r step, but you'll be making &&dSand&&r renewably. With renewable Sand comes renewable Glass (remember to try using an &&9Arc Furnace&&r for that sweet &&adoubled&&r yield!).
Quartz Sand Dust centrifuges into a chanced output of &&3Certus Quartz&&r Dust.

subtitle.text: Two vast and trunkless legs of stone...
